column4: Do you guys get a lag when u run youtube videos on firefox on fullscreen.. is it got something do with flash...
you can use mplayer
you mean download and later play them with mplayer
you can also stream
No, I mean is there a fix available for the browsers
it's not a fix for the browsers
it's flash that sucks
so its not possible to view the youtube videos on firefox or any other browser... whats the pple at Canonical doing anythig to solve this
canonical are not developers of flash
you can
so can i
actually i disagree with you
and yet again it is *not* ubuntu fault, it's adobe

no idea, i use only ubuntu for gui, others are headless

edbian : how bout using the older versions of Flash.. Shldnt that solve the issue... I am on Jaunty

since the reason to release new version is to _fix_ bugs, to introduce new ones
